data.title: Footfall by Larry Niven; Jerry Pournelle: Fine Hardcover (1985) First Edition, Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780345323477 - Signed by Author(s) - First Edition - Hardcover - Del Rey, U.S.A. - 1985 - Condition: Fine - Fine - Signed by Niven at EerieCon 2011 - Footfall
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

We accept credit cards through PayPal using the account email@eyriehousebooks.com. You may also send us a check or money order made out to "Eyrie House Books". Massachusetts residents please add 6.25% sales tax.

If you receive a book that is not as advertised, please notify us within 15 days after the book is delivered.

Kimball M. Rudeen

3 Thoreau Lane

Tyngsboro, MA 01879

email@eyriehousebooks.com

(978) 226-5635

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
